title: Orthopedic Alternatives Medical Acupuncture De Pere Wisconsin
description: Orthopedic Alternatives is an acupuncture and Chinese medical clinic located at 3311 S. Packerland Drive Suite A #20, De Pere, Wisconsin, United States treating neurological and musculoskeletal issues focused on reducing pain, increasing mobility, and improving circulation.
cleaned_text: Helping patients achieve their health and wellness goals through individualized treatment plans that heal the root of the problem, not just the symptoms. WHAT IS ACUPUNCTURE? Acupuncture is an ancient tool to treat a wide array of conditions, both acute and chronic. Fine needles are inserted into specific points on the body to release trigger points, promote healing and relieve pain. Knee Pain Acupuncture Rotator Cuff Injury, Tendinitis, Arthritis Acupuncture Low Back Pain, Arthritis, Herniated Disc, Spondylosis, Bulge Disc, Annular Tear, Acupuncture, Natural Medicine Knee Pain Acupuncture COULD ACUPUNCTURE BENEFIT YOU? Several years ago, the World Health Organization (WHO) published an official report listing 31 symptoms, conditions and diseases that have been shown in controlled trials to be treated effectively by acupuncture. Common ailments that respond well to acupuncture include: - tendonitis - arthritis - headaches - chronic pain - neuropathy - fatigue - respiratory disorders - digestive disorders - dysmenorrhea - skin problems Availability by Appointment Only Monday - Thursday 8:00am - 6:00pm LOCATION 3313 S. Packerland
